video.title: Scaredy Squirrel
video.synopsis: With help from skunk Dave, the lovably geeky Scaredy Squirrel uses his quirks and creativity to tackle the challenges of daily life in Balsa City.

episodes.synopsis: To avoid bathroom duty, Scaredy must hide a stain on his uniform from Nestor; Scaredy loses his confidence after a cowlick gets the better of him.
episodes.title: Sticky Situation / Cowlicked

episodes.synopsis: Mishaps ensue when Dave and Scaredy find a lucky penny; Scaredy learns some hard lessons in management when he's put in charge of the Stash 'n' Hoard.
episodes.title: Luck Be a Penny / How to Succeed in Groceries

episodes.synopsis: Dave befriends the Paddle Dogs, putting his friendship with Scaredy in jeopardy; on a hot day, Scaredy loses Richard and begins a frantic search.
episodes.title: Paddle Dogs / Looking for Richard

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy is bullied by Rex but receives help from an unlikely source; Scaredy and Paddy must figure out how to share a golden paddleball they co-own.
episodes.title: Way of the Fish Lips / The Golden Paddleball

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy loses his job when his water-clogged ears cause a disastrous mix-up; after he saves her life, Sally becomes Scaredy's too-devoted helper.
episodes.title: Water Damage / Life Saver

episodes.synopsis: The store has become far too fancy, but Scaredy has a plan to tone it down; Scaredy is tricked into entering the Mr. Perfect Balsa competition.
episodes.title: Fancy Some Tea? / Mr. Perfect Balsa

episodes.synopsis: When Paddy defects to the Stash 'n' Hoard, Scaredy must fight for his job; snerds are Balsa's latest craze, and Scaredy will do anything to own one.
episodes.title: Who's Your Paddy? / Snerd Envy

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy vows to overcome his fear and ride a giant roller coaster; when the King Nutbar company stops making his favorite snack, Scaredy investigates.
episodes.title: The Coast Is Fear / The Madness of King Nutbar

episodes.synopsis: To win back a coveted acorn, Scaredy must entertain a little girl; Scaredy tries to help his hero, ex-star Lars Von Stacking, regain his confidence.
episodes.title: Children of the Acorn / Awaken the Stacker Within

episodes.synopsis: While guarding the store, Scaredy is confronted by a burglar; to be near his crush, Scaredy puts aside his stage fright and tries out for a play.
episodes.title: Shop Cop / Acting Silly

episodes.synopsis: As Lumber Jack Day approaches, Scaredy vows to rid the holiday of commercialization; Scaredy's new suggestion box creates chaos at the store.
episodes.title: Lumber Jack Day / Suggestion Box Blues

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy comes to the rescue when Paddleball Camp takes a disastrous turn; Scaredy becomes the new TV weatherman, but is anyone paying attention?
episodes.title: Camp or Consequences / Fairweather Squirrel

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy jumps into action when lady thugs threaten to eat everything in Balsa; to increase sales, Scaredy tries to make the store gang work together.
episodes.title: There Is No I in Groceries / When Thugs Attack

episodes.synopsis: To make Nestor nicer, Scaredy decides to make his dreams come true; Scaredy is forced to work at a chili place for a no-good, wallet-stealing cat.
episodes.title: Dreamweaver / Chili Con Scaredy

episodes.synopsis: Lonely without Richard, Scaredy cares for a naughty rock; stuck on a snowy Mount Balsa, Scaredy and Dave try to flee before the Corgin finds them.
episodes.title: Rockabye Rock / Beware the Corgin

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy creates a potion that makes Richard alarmingly large; Scaredy can't keep up with the demands of his new hammock's assembly safety robot.
episodes.title: It's Not Easy Being Green / Hammock Havoc

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy has his paws full when everyone in Balsa City becomes zombies; when Dave finds he can no longer fart, Scaredy does his best to reassure him.
episodes.title: Aisle of the Dead / Where the Stink At?

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy and Paddy get into trouble trying to out-prank each other; Dave needs quarters for his toy fire truck, so Scaredy helps him find a job.
episodes.title: Pranks for Nothing / Fist Full of Quarters

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy loses a tooth, then tries to trick the Molar Owl; Scaredy has to buy Mildred a gift and sets out to discover what the dreary clerk might like.
episodes.title: Nothing but the Tooth / From Rodent with Love

episodes.synopsis: Momma orders Scaredy and Nestor to team up for the Balsa Bathtub Race; Scaredy panics when Nestor's feisty grandma sneaks off while under his care.
episodes.title: The Tubtastic Duo / Mrs. Nestor's Mother's Momma

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy is replaced by a stacking robot and must find a way to get his job back; Scaredy swears that this Halloweekend, he will do all the scaring.
episodes.title: Stackinator / Halloweekend

episodes.synopsis: A quest for the perfect pickle lands Scaredy in hot water; when their favorite cop show puts a call out for extras, Scaredy and Dave race to be cast.
episodes.title: A Bit of a Pickle / Goat Police

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy lands a job protecting the city from a river monster; Stash 'n' Hoard and Sortafresh compete to reach the "one millionth customer" mark first.
episodes.title: Jawhead / Store Wars

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy learns a tough lesson when he buys dicey gadgets from a slick salesman; Scaredy helps boss Nestor after he loses his job to his own brother.
episodes.title: Seth Is a Salesman / Less Nestorman

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy plays coach when Dave enters a cleaning supply contest; Scaredy learns a secret about Paddy, so Paddy tries to uncover one about Scaredy.
episodes.title: Neat Wits / Mall Rat

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy and Dave's friendship is tested when Dave becomes an accidental celebrity; Scaredy finds a treasure map that leads to an exhausting adventure.
episodes.title: Big Mistack / A Squirreled Away Treasure
